title: Can someone please explain this?
content: Should we register for PESSAT now? What happens if we don't register and try to get in through CET/JEE later?

comments.body:
It clearly says, Pessat will not be conducted any more. Meaning, Pessat is not happening, nobody can register or take the exam.

Instead admissions will be sone through JEE mains exam and KCET exam.
The answer to your question has been circled by you yourself

https://preview.redd.it/wr3nlghd4aoe1.png?width=1080&format=png&auto=webp&s=89866a3d5a6a73f30b5b656eb7e37bd4e484e783

My question is, should we register now?

ðŸ« bruhh I had this doubt earlier
The thing is I did register already..and don't even know if it's necessary or no... 
I did it 2m back ig..
TLDR no pessat from this year onwards, you can apply for councilling for either your jee or kcet rank, best of luck to you if ur appearing for the councilling
